metadata.title: Global Audio AI Cloud Providers Database
metadata.description: Comprehensive database of Speech-to-Text (STT), Text-to-Speech (TTS), and Audio-to-Audio cloud providers worldwide

providers.name: ElevenLabs
providers.languages: 70+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Polish, Hindi, Arabic, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Vietnamese, Thai, Indonesian

providers.name: Deepgram
providers.languages: 36+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Hindi, Portuguese, Dutch, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese

providers.name: AssemblyAI
providers.languages: 99+ languages with automatic language detection, speaker diarization in 95 languages

providers.name: OpenAI (Whisper/TTS)
providers.languages: 57+ languages for STT (Whisper), 6 voices for TTS

providers.name: Google Cloud Text-to-Speech
providers.languages: 75+ languages, 380+ voices including WaveNet, Neural2, Studio voices

providers.name: Amazon Transcribe
providers.languages: 100+ languages including medical transcription for English/Spanish

providers.name: IBM Watson Speech to Text
providers.languages: 17+ languages including English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Arabic, Portuguese

providers.name: Cartesia
providers.languages: 40+ languages for TTS (Sonic 3), 15 languages free tier

providers.name: Hume AI
providers.languages: Multiple languages with emotional expression capabilities

providers.name: Gladia
providers.languages: 100+ languages with code-switching, translation to 99 languages

providers.name: Unreal Speech
providers.languages: English (5 voices: Scarlett, Dan, Will, Liv, Amy)

providers.name: Sarvam AI
providers.languages: 22+ Indian languages: Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, Kannada, Malayalam, Punjabi, Odia, Assamese, Urdu + English

providers.name: iFlytek
providers.languages: Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, 23 dialects), English, Japanese, Korean, 60+ languages

providers.name: Alibaba Cloud Intelligent Speech
providers.languages: Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, Sichuan, Wu), English, Japanese, Indonesian, Malay, Thai, Vietnamese

providers.name: Baidu AI Cloud Speech
providers.languages: Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, Sichuan, other dialects), English

providers.name: Tencent Cloud Speech
providers.languages: Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, Shanghainese), English, Japanese, Korean, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian

providers.name: Huawei Cloud Speech
providers.languages: Chinese, English, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Arabic

providers.name: Vbee
providers.languages: Vietnamese (regional accents: Northern, Central, Southern), English

providers.name: Yandex SpeechKit
providers.languages: Russian, English, German, French, Turkish, Hebrew, Finnish, Swedish, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese, Italian, Spanish, Uzbek, Kazakh

providers.name: Phonexia
providers.languages: 57-64 languages including Eastern European (Czech, Slovak, Polish, Hungarian, Romanian, Bulgarian, Serbian, Croatian, Slovenian, Ukrainian, Russian)

providers.name: Silero Models
providers.languages: Russian, Ukrainian, Belarusian, Uzbek, Kazakh, Kyrgyz, Tajik, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Georgian, English, German, Spanish, French, Indic languages

providers.name: Sestek / Knovvu
providers.languages: Turkish, Arabic, Azerbaijani, Kazakh, Kurdish, Persian, Urdu, 40+ languages total

providers.name: ISSAI (Nazarbayev University)
providers.languages: Kazakh, Turkic languages (Azerbaijani, Bashkir, Kyrgyz, Sakha, Tatar, Turkish, Turkmen, Uyghur, Uzbek)

providers.name: NeuralSpace
providers.languages: 115+ languages including Arabic dialects, African languages, Asian languages

providers.name: Lahajati
providers.languages: Arabic (108+ dialects including Gulf, Levantine, Egyptian, Maghrebi, MSA)

providers.name: Verbit
providers.languages: English, Hebrew, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese

providers.name: Intron Health
providers.languages: 20+ African languages, 200+ African accents (Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Swahili, Twi)

providers.name: Lelapa AI
providers.languages: isiZulu, Sesotho, isiXhosa, Afrikaans, Setswana, Swahili, Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, Nigerian Pidgin

providers.name: Masakhane
providers.languages: 50+ African languages (Swahili, Yoruba, Igbo, Zulu, Amharic, Hausa, Twi, Wolof, Fula, Shona)

providers.name: Vozy
providers.languages: Spanish (8 regional accents: Colombian, Mexican, Argentine, Peruvian, Chilean, Puerto Rican, Venezuelan), Portuguese, English

providers.name: ReadSpeaker
providers.languages: 50+ languages, 200+ voices (Nordic: Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Finnish, Icelandic)

providers.name: Cereproc
providers.languages: English, Scottish English, Welsh, Irish, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Romanian, Polish, Portuguese

providers.name: Speechly
providers.languages: Finnish, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian

providers.name: DeepInfra
providers.languages: Multiple (depends on hosted model - Whisper, Parler, etc.)

providers.name: Vosk
providers.languages: 20+ languages (English, Chinese, Russian, French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Turkish, Vietnamese, Italian, Dutch, Catalan, Arabic, Greek, Farsi, Filipino, Ukrainian, Kazakh, Swedish, Japanese, Esperanto)

providers.name: Mozilla DeepSpeech
providers.languages: English (primary), community models for 30+ other languages

providers.name: Piper TTS
providers.languages: 30+ languages with multiple voices per language

providers.name: Kokoro TTS
providers.languages: English, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Hindi, German

providers.name: Bark (Suno)
providers.languages: English, Chinese, French, German, Hindi, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Turkish

providers.name: AlfaNum
providers.languages: Serbian, Croatian, Montenegrin, Bosnian, Macedonian (Cyrillic/Latin scripts)

providers.name: NB-AI Lab (Norwegian/Sámi)
providers.languages: Norwegian (Bokmål, Nynorsk), North Sámi, Lule Sámi

providers.name: MeloTTS
providers.languages: English, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, French, Spanish
